Acquire some §6Iron Ingot§rs for tool forging.

§6Iron Ore§r spawns at §eY: 64§r to §eY: 3§r in the Overworld. Once you have found Iron, smelt it in a §6Furnace§r or throw the Ore block in the §3Smeltery§r and pour the iron into the §6Ingot Cast§r to §aobtain it's Ingot form§r.
